title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XVII, pt. 800 - General Rules And Regulations
content:

Statutory authority: L. 1925, ch. 192, as
amd. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
